effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. Removes the effects of detect or protect from the target before hitting. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Removes the effects of detect or protect from the target before hitting. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.

flavor_text.x_y: An attack that hits a target using Protect or Detect. This also lifts the effects of those moves.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: An attack that hits a target using Protect or Detect. This also lifts the effects of those moves.
